TEXT.S:
kakiliman pucu' nu titi "kamu nu Ing, sarcoma, kamu nu Si-la, ,sárkomma, makayniay sárka imi titi, ahemi' sakaput, sazikuzay a cudad~om tuzu' pucu'" anucaay pangangan la'cusay a pucu' nu titi, u la'cusay a pucu', sakaput a lalekalan u micukelay tu sakaput cyen-pye-yey sakaput "luceken, makayniay cong-pye-cen" :sarcoma;:sárkommasárka~om-
nilaculan tu pabaway banges a sakaput la'cusay a pucu' "carcinoma, gang" atu izang tu due'say nu la'cusay a pucu' "izang a gang atu la'cusay alutid pucu'" pucu' nu titi tungusay u la'cusay a pucu' a masumad ku imelang. amapucu' ku titi palalecad kiadidian tu gang, la'cusay a pucu' masumad ku imelang pakala tu 1% pasentu u pucu' nu titi. pucu' nu titi lalekalan u cyen-cung-ce micukel tu sakaputtu cyen-pye-ye sakaput " cye-ti sakaput ukak, dawmi'ay ukak titi nu heci atu simal sakaput" carcinoma1%-
sateked tu pucu' nu titi caay ku piduduc tu sakaput kacacayat a pangangan, pucu' nu titi miduduc tu si-paw atu ya-si-paw nu mauzipay tahkal ku waway nu pisatebud mapababenis tu "talakaway, tanengay, adidi'ay". payawan uzuma micukaymas tu palikaten mingaay atu nu sapayu apingaay, tu talakaway a pucu' nu titi, nika mahiniay nikaawas tu picici' a mangaay.
tatudungay atu adidi'ay a pucu' nu titi sangaleb ayadah ku patatungus tu picici', nu sapayu atu palikat a sapingaay. uyza adidid'ay a pucu' nu titi hakay uzuma nikasemel atu malimad tabatad, kuyni pucu' nu titi zuma u pikelit ku sapingaan. yadah ku pucu' nu titi sakay sapayu a mingaay sakalawlaw maazih mahapinang talakaw ku mauzipay nu imelangay. patinaku ayaw u saapayu ku sapingaay tu pucu' nu titi, iza ku nu zumaay ukak a pucu' nu titiu imelangay u nikauzip pakal tu 20% pasentu, nika imahini macakat tu 60%-70% pasentu. 20%60%-70%
pucu' nu titi alamangan pucu' nu titi u la'cusay a pucu' duduc tu nisateked nu WHO, pucu' nu titi pababenisen pakala tu 100 a lamangan. nisateked angangan u piduduc tu lalekalan nu sakaput,adidi'ay nu mililiday masumad, u wayway atu mauzipay picidekan mikawaway tu pucu' nu titi u pabaway nu banges a si-paws likutay a si-paw mala u lacu'say a pucu'. anu mala u butukaay a heci nu sipaw, mala u kak, micukelay tu sakaput, ulat a sisil, sakalawawan a keliw si-paw mala u la'cusay a pucu'. WHO100 labuay nu izang salengacay izang a imelang u pucu' tu ku sausi, sakasa pangangan han tu lacu'say pucu' a izang. pihacengay a gang hatu u gang nu atanay, namahiza iza ku tusaay atay a sigang. zuma mahiniay hatu u malimaday,
zumaay mangay tu ku pucu' nu titi, zuma baluha a pucu' tahekal aca, uyni u pihacengay a gang. pihacengay a gang caay ku malimaday agang. mangaay tu ku tiniay a pucu', tahkala tu ku zumaay a pucu', uyni pangangan han tu pihacengay a gang. pihacengay a gang amatudus tu, u pakatineng pihacengay a gang macalap tu6% pasentu ku siimelangay tu gang. pihacengay a gang u madayumay mangaay u alutid nu cucu', takulaw a gang, laway a gang, butuka a gang ku maazihay tu. 6%
dengdeng a imelang pucu' nu titi I Amilika paymihcaan uyza dada' pakala tu 15000 a lamangan, hina caay kaazih, namahiza pucu' nu titi i Amilika paymihcaan 150 a mang ku baluhay nu maazihay a gangan nu imelangay hakay 1% pasentu. pucu' nu titi malilid ku kasa mihcaan a lekad nu tademaw. 15000;1501% saba tu 35 ku mihcaan nu tademaw maazih paketun tu imelang nuheni iza pakalatu 50% pasentu ku pucu' nu titi a ukak ni imelang atu 20% payentu ku dawmi'ay sakaput nu siimelangay tu ledek a pucu'. palalecad tu wawa, uzuma mahiniay u lamenengay heci a pucu' nu titi, ahemi'ay a ukak pucu' nu titi atu zazan nu bituka a heci nu pucu'ay apucu' nu titi i balakiaytu a tademaws nu imelangay sangale hinamaazihay tu. katuud ku adidi'ay pucu' nu titi a ukak, pasu yu-wen-s pucu' nu titi atu pucu' nu titi a ukak i masakapahay atu wawaan sangaleb hina maazihaytu. 3550%20%
u tineng i Amilika, pitu a bulad u katinengan amin u pucu' a buladan. i 2016 a mihca 12 a bulad, Ing-kow sapayu a kusi Midmeds patalakaw tu nikatineng tu gang a imelang, palekal i Ing-kow tu pucu' a demiad. 201612MidMeds
malalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinengan :
